description: There's a saying that goes, "There's no such thing as bad weather, only bad clothing." With the Ayaba Long parka, you can confidently face winter head-on. Engineered to endure the most extreme Canadian winters, this parka is built to withstand temperatures as low as -30°C. Its premium down and feather insulation ensures you stay cozy and warm even in the coldest conditions. The waterproof, breathable, and windproof nylon shell protects against icy gusts, keeping you comfortable and shielded from the elements. Its full-length design offers complete coverage for your legs, protecting them from the cold and wind.
name: Ayaba Long Jacket - Womens

specs.value: White duck down, 80% down, 20% feather - fill power of 700 in³
